Introduction

Miyawaki Sakura is a Japanese singer-songwriter, dancer, composer, actress, and model under Source Music and A.M. Entertainment. She is best known as the oldest member of the girl group LE SSERAFIM and a former member of the project girl group IZ*ONE and the Japanese idol girl group HKT48.

She ranked #2 in the hit survival show Produce48 with 316,105 votes, earning her a spot in the group. She made her debut as a member of IZ*ONE on October 29, 2018, with their first mini album "COLOR*IZ". On April 29, 2021, IZ*ONE disbanded after their contract of two years and six months ended.

After IZ*ONE's disbandment in April 2021, Sakura confirmed on May 15, 2021, that she would leave HKT48 and she held a graduation concert on June 1. On March 14, 2022, Sakura, alongside former IZ*ONE member Kim Chaewon, signed exclusive contracts with Source Music and will be debuting as part of LE SSERAFIM in May. On March 21, 2022, Japanese talent agency A.M. Entertainment confirmed through their official website that she had joined the agency for her individual activities in Japan.

Sakura debuted as a member of LE SSERAFIM on May 2, 2022, with their first mini album "FEARLESS."

Fun facts

1
Sakura listened to aespa's "Black Mamba". Her favorite members are Winter and Karina.
…
2
Sakura's favorite manga's are One Piece, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Theseus no Fune, The Promised Neverland. She's the type who might not watch the drama when she's read the original manga.
…
3
Sakura always looks after Eunchae. Before they debuted, Sakura noticed that their maknae was struggling during their practice. She approached their instructor and asked them how she can get close to Eunchae so that she can take a better care of her.
…
4
During LE SSERAFIM's debut showcase, Sakura expressed that she felt pressured because it was her third time to debut in a group.
…
5
Sakura likes original and salty popcorn, and strongly dislikes caramel popcorn.
…
6
Sakura's parents divorced when she was very young & so she didn't really remember her father. During a handshake event in her hometown in Japan, a man came up to her & said he was just there to support her. A woman was behind him which she assumed was the man's mother. Something told her that that man was her father & the woman was her grandmother after she shook hands with them but sadly, she never got to confirm it.
…
7
Sakura's bias in (G)I-DLE is Minnie.
…
8
Sakura is the model/producer for the color contact lens “MOLAK”. She’s also involved in the production of the lenses, she made the time to check the color, the size and to perfect the product. The product has sold 1 million lenses in two months.
…
9
When Sakura signed with HYBE the only condition she added to the contract was to make it so she wouldn't be the leader of LE SSERAFIM.
…
10
Sakura's bias in NewJeans is Haerin.
…
